s: Great band and vintage Butterfield on the harp. Love the standards, such as Walkin' Blues. All in all, this disc doesn't sound "dated" to me in any way. ... Were they ever! t: Paul Butterfield - Wikipedia
s: February 4, 2025 - The band was also among the first racially integrated blues groups. After the breakup of the group in 1971, Butterfield continued to tour and record with the band Paul Butterfield's Better Days, with his mentor Muddy Waters, and with members of the roots-rock group the Band.
